title: Ruby - Local Environment Setup in Windows
content:
Here are the steps to install Ruby on a Windows machine.
NOTE - You may have different versions available at the time of installation.
- Download a zipped file having the latest version of Ruby. Follow <a title="https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/" href="https://www.ruby-lang.
